TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit native unsigned int extends System.ValueType implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 平台專用的類型，用以代表指標或控點。

span.span: A platform-specific type that is used to represent a pointer or a handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類型的設計是其大小為平台特定的整數。The type is designed to be an integer whose size is platform-specific. 也就是說，此類型的執行個體必須是在 32 位元硬體和作業系統上的 32 位元和 64 位元硬體和作業系統上的 64 位元。That is, an instance of this type is expected to be 32-bits on 32-bit hardware and operating systems, and 64-bits on 64-bit hardware and operating systems. > [!IMPORTANT] > 型別是符合 CLS 標準，而類型不是。The type is CLS-compliant, while the type is not. 只有類型用於 common language runtime。Only the type is used in the common language runtime. 提供大部分都是為了維持與架構對稱的型別型別。The type is provided mostly to maintain architectural symmetry with the type. 類型可以使用這些語言的支援指標，以及參考資料而且不支援指標的語言之間通用的方法。The type can be used by languages that support pointers, and as a common means of referring to data between languages that do and do not support pointers. 物件也可用來保存控點。 objects can also be used to hold handles. 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface.

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 將不帶正負號指標的值加上位移。

span.span: Adds an offset to the value of an unsigned pointer.

returns.span: 新的不帶正負號指標，反映將 加上 的結果。

span.span: A new unsigned pointer that reflects the addition of to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會擲回例外狀況，如果結果太大而無法表示為指定的平台上的指標。The method does not throw an exception if the result is too large to represent as a pointer on the specified platform. 相反地，在 unchecked 內容中執行加法運算。Instead, the addition operation is performed in an unchecked context. 不支援運算子多載或自訂運算子的語言可以使用這個方法將位移新增至不帶正負號的指標的值。Languages that do not support operator overloading or custom operators can use this method to add an offset to the value of an unsigned pointer. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件，指向十個元素陣列的開頭，然後呼叫方法來逐一查看陣列中的項目。The following example instantiates a object that points to the beginning of a ten-element array, and then calls the method to iterate the elements in the array. [!code-csharp[System.UIntPtr.Add#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.add/cs/add1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.UIntPtr.Add#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.add/vb/add1.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[System.UIntPtr.op_Addition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.op_addition/cs/op_addition1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.UIntPtr.op_Addition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.op_addition/vb/op_addition1.vb#1)] 不支援自訂運算子的語言可以呼叫方法改為。Languages that do not support custom operators can call the method instead. 如果結果太大而無法表示為指定的平台上的指標，加法運算就不會擲回例外狀況。The addition operation does not throw an exception if the result is too large to represent as a pointer on the specified platform. 相反地，它會在 unchecked 內容中執行。Instead, it is performed in an unchecked context. 這個運算子的對等方法是。The equivalent method for this operator is .

[!code-csharp[System.UIntPtr.op_Addition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.op_addition/cs/op_subtraction1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.UIntPtr.op_Addition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.op_addition/vb/op_subtraction1.vb#2)] 不支援自訂運算子的語言可以呼叫方法改為。Languages that do not support custom operators can call the method instead. 如果結果太小而無法表示為指定的平台上的指標，減法運算就不會擲回例外狀況。The subtraction operation does not throw an exception if the result is too small to represent as a pointer on the specified platform. 相反地，它會在 unchecked 內容中執行。Instead, it is performed in an unchecked context.

returns.span: 64 位元不帶正負號的整數，等於這個執行個體的值。

span.span: A 64-bit unsigned integer equal to the value of this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly UIntPtr Zero;
.field public static initonly native unsigned int Zero
Public Shared ReadOnly Zero As UIntPtr
public: static initonly UIntPtr Zero;

summary.span: 表示已經初始化為零的指標或控點之唯讀欄位。

span.span: A read-only field that represents a pointer or handle that has been initialized to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位的值不等於`null`。The value of this field is not equivalent to `null`. 使用此欄位來有效率地判斷執行個體是否已設定為非零的值。Use this field to efficiently determine whether an instance of has been set to a value other than zero. 例如，假設 uip，變數是的執行個體。For example, assume the variable, uip, is an instance of . 您可以判斷是否它已設定和比較，例如建構函式，所傳回的值:" `if uip != new UIntPtr(0)...` "。You can determine if it has been set by comparing it to the value returned by a constructor, for example: " `if uip != new UIntPtr(0)...` ". 不過，叫用的建構函式，若要取得未初始化的指標是沒有效率。However, invoking a constructor to get an unintialized pointer is inefficient. 最好是碼" `if uip != UIntPtr.Zero...` "，或 「 `if !UIntPtr.Zero.Equals(uip)...` "。It is better to code either " `if uip != UIntPtr.Zero...` ", or " `if !UIntPtr.Zero.Equals(uip)...` ".
